name: Hollow Saints
shortDescription: The Hollow Saints are not individuals, but fragments of a single dead divinity dispersed across flesh-urns and memory-bound vessels. They do not fight to win â€” they fight to endure. Each step is ritual. Each model a reliquary. And every loss is just a new echo placed into the world.
description: The Hollow Saints are former holy warriors who have been hollowed out by their faith. Their warriors wear armor made from the remains of their fallen comrades, and they carry relics that can channel the power of their lost divinity.
